title: Emails and alert policies can be altered by malicious users.
vulnerability_information:
#Recreate Steps
1) Create Two Accounts
2) In separate browsers (Firefox and Chrome) log into each account and go to the edit page
     a) https://rpm.newrelic.com/users/*/edit
3) Check one of the email or alert boxes and click save. Gather the post.
a) Should be similar to this:
```
utf8=â&authenticity_token=evak6B68Oennzs4xwSpZg7FdwAG83mjhf2PyEiakNV8=
&email_preference[account_view][id]=2175867
&email_preference[account_view][send_mobile_crash_emails]=0
&email_preference[account_view][send_mobile_crash_emails]=1
&commit=Save+email+preferences
```
The email_preference[account_view][id] is the item of interest here:

For the demonstration in out video:
firefox: 2175859
chrome: 2175867

A malicious user could cycle through the user base turning off the "Mobile crash reporting" and the "Weekly Emails" The prior being the more important.

A video is attached showing the attack described.
vulnerability_information_html:
Recreate Steps

1) Create Two Accounts
2) In separate browsers (Firefox and Chrome) log into each account and go to the edit page
a) https://rpm.newrelic.com/users/*/edit
3) Check one of the email or alert boxes and click save. Gather the post.
a) Should be similar to this:

utf8=â&authenticity_token=evak6B68Oennzs4xwSpZg7FdwAG83mjhf2PyEiakNV8=
&email_preference[account_view][id]=2175867
&email_preference[account_view][send_mobile_crash_emails]=0
&email_preference[account_view][send_mobile_crash_emails]=1
&commit=Save+email+preferences

The email_preference[account_view][id] is the item of interest here:

For the demonstration in out video:
firefox: 2175859
chrome: 2175867

A malicious user could cycle through the user base turning off the "Mobile crash reporting" and the "Weekly Emails" The prior being the more important.

A video is attached showing the attack described.

activities.message:
Hi hogarth45,

Thank you for reporting this vulnerability! I have verified that we are not properly validating the email_preference[account_view][id]. We will file an issue with the appropriate engineering team.

Thanks,
- Alex
activities.markdown_message:
Hi hogarth45,

Thank you for reporting this vulnerability! I have verified that we are not properly validating the email_preference[account_view][id]. We will file an issue with the appropriate engineering team.

Thanks,

  • Alex

activities.message: We believe this issue to be resolved. Thanks very much for reporting it to us, we really appreciate your help keeping New Relic and its customers secure!
activities.markdown_message: We believe this issue to be resolved. Thanks very much for reporting it to us, we really appreciate your help keeping New Relic and its customers secure!

activities.message: Can this be publicly released please?
